'''Relay Balls''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]], primarily found at the [[Ancestral Temple]] and in [[Ochkanatlan]].

A similar mechanic, '''Replica "Relay Balls,"''' is used in the [[Phlogiston Extraction Research Center]].
